DOC.brief_summary: This study compare 12 week , two treatment strategy Initial Maintenance Therapy : fluticasone propionate alone salmeterol/fluticasone propionate combination adult moderate persistent asthma
DOC.brief_title: SERETIDE 100/50 bd ( Twice Daily ) Versus FLIXOTIDE 100 bd As Initial Maintenance Therapy In Moderate Asthma In Adults
DOC.detailed_description: A multicentre randomise , double-blind , parallel-group study compare salmeterol/fluticasone propionate combination ( SERETIDETM DISKUSTM 50/100 ) 50/100µg one inhalation twice daily fluticasone propionate ( FLIXOTIDETM DISKUSTM 100 ) 100µg one inhalation twice daily initial maintenance therapy 12 week adults persistent moderate asthma
DOC.mesh_term: Fluticasone Propionate , Salmeterol Xinafoate Drug Combination
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : male female ≥ 18 documented history asthma reversibility FEV1 PEF ≥ 12 % ( post 400µg salbu ) moderate asthma ( daily symptom , daily rescue use , PEF = 6080 % predict value ) naive ≥ 4weeksfree ICS ( inhaled corticosteroid ) Exclusion criterion : respiratory disorder FEV1 < 60 % predict exacerbation/respiratory infection ≤ 4 week oral/parenteral/depot corticosteroid ≤ 6 month LABA/oral β2 agonist/ ALT/ theophylline ≤ 4 week smoker former smoker ≥ 5 pack year
